name: py-priority
description:
Priority is a pure-Python implementation of the priority logic for
HTTP/2, set out in RFC 7540 Section 5.3 (Stream Priority). This logic
allows for clients to express a preference for how the server allocates
its (limited) resources to the many outstanding HTTP requests that may
be running over a single HTTP/2 connection.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-hypercorn
dependent_to.description: A ASGI Server based on Hyper libraries and inspired by Gunicorn.
